about: Hello, my name is Satyam Rastogi. I'm a full stack developer.
I worked on many project's Realted to backend development and frontend development
Currently I'm working in Oracle as a Associate Software Developer
technology i worked on React for frontend development
Spring boot for backend development Oracle database ,My SQL, MongoDB, Elastic Stack, Kafka ,Docker ,Jenkins
Worked on Monolithic as well as Micro-Service architecture
I'm constantly learning new things. currently those things include gaining more experience with React, Express JS, and Node JS
footer_content: My name is Satyam Rastogi. I'm a full stack engineer with experience in Spring boot, Docker, React
